example.text: Innocent families and communities in Israel are under attack at the hands of the Palestinian Islamic Jihad. I fully condemn these attacks by a radical terrorist group. Israel has the right to defend itself, and I’m grateful for the lives that the Iron Dome has saved. ? ?? ?
